item.description: Kevin and I are looking forward to hosting again. All are welcome, even if you are not a gourmet chef (snack food, beverages, etc. always welcome). Please bring a copy of the recipe you make, in case there are people with food allergies or someone who wants to have a copy of it. Please keep it vegan.
item.why: It's been a while since we've had one of these.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Pot Luck
